titles: A vindication of the people of God, called Quakers ... being an ansvver to a book, dedicated to them, by one George Pressick of Dublin : in which book many lyes and calumnies are presented against the innocent people of God ... / by E.B.
author: Burrough, Edward, 1634-1662.
notes: Written by Edward Burrough. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Pressick, George. --  Brief relation of some remarkable passages of the Anabaptists in Germany.
